definitions.definition: Favouritism to friends without regard for their qualifications ; especially ( politics ) , in their appointment to political positions .
The condition of being friends; friendship ; also, the ability or inclination to make friends.

main_definition: ( originally US , derogatory ) Favouritism to friends without regard for their qualifications ; especially ( politics ) , in their appointment to political positions .
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) The condition of being friends; friendship ; also, the ability or inclination to make friends.
